Name: Lemon Caipirovska
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE lemon in base of shaker, add other ingredients and SHAKE with 6oz scoop crushed ice. Pour into glass without straining and serve with straws.
History: Created in 2002 by Tony Conigliaro at Isola, London, England.
